title: Maps showing difficulty in African state building

content.prompt: The maps of Africa above best explain which of the following about African history in the twentieth century?

choices.label: Why Islam has continued to spread in sub-Saharan Africa following decolonization
Why most African states achieved independence within a few years of one another
Why some former colonial powers have continued to intervene in the internal affairs of their former colonies after independence
Why African state-building efforts have been hindered by the persistence of political boundaries inherited from the colonial era

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
